name: Broken Sword 2 - The Smoking Mirror
description:
Broken Sword 2 - The Smoking Mirror is an adventure game developed by Revolution Software. It came out on 31-10-1997. It was published by Virgin Interactive Entertainment. On review aggregator Metacritic, Broken Sword 2 - The Smoking Mirror has a score of 69. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Broken Sword 2 - The Smoking Mirror is available on PlayStation and PC.
